title: Cassandra Summit Training Day - Sunday March 12th
description:
Be sure to register for the Cassandra Summit here: 
https://events.linuxfoundation.org/cassandra-summit/

And don't forget to sign up for training!
https://events.linuxfoundation.org/cassandra-summit/program/training/#

CONNECT WITH DATASTAX
Subscribe: http://www.youtube.com/c/datastaxdevs?sub_confirmation=1 
Twitter: https://twitter.com/datastaxdevs
Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/datastaxdevs

About DataStax:
DataStax is the company behind the massively scalable, highly available, cloud-native NoSQL data platform built on Apache Cassandra™. DataStax gives developers and enterprises the freedom to run data in any cloud, Kubernetes, hybrid or bare metal at global scale with zero downtime and zero lock-in. More than 450 of the world’s leading enterprises including Capital One, Cisco, Comcast, Delta Airlines, Macy’s, McDonald’s, Safeway, Sony, and Walmart use DataStax to build transformational data architectures for real-world outcomes. For more, visit DataStax.com and @DataStax.

About DataStax Developer:
On the DataStax Developers YouTube channel, you can find tutorials, workshops and much more to help you learn and stay updated with the latest information on Apache Cassandra©.  Visit https://datastax.com/dev for more free learning resources.

transcript.text: do you enjoy our YouTube workshops you're probably wondering what could be better than viewing top-notch devrel content for Cassandra pulsar and Astra on YouTube why seeing us in person of course as a part of the 2023 Cassandra Summit in San Jose we are going to be running three live and in-person training workshops the day before the summer that's right on Sunday March 12th at the McHenry Convention Center in San Jose California we are going to be running not one not two but three in-person training sessions that means that you can join us for great in-person sessions like building scalable applications and data models running Cloud native deployments and designing solution architectures Apache Cassandra for Architects and data engineers how can you be a part of this it's simple head out to events.linuxfoundation.org Cassandra Dash Summit register and sign up for training it's that simple that's Sunday March 12th the day before the Cassandra Summit from 8 30 a.m to 4 30 PM we'll be having three live and in-person training workshops if you work with Cassandra in production you won't want to miss this join us and learn with data Stacks Developers
